title: Fix app blocking pipeline
description: Fix 6 issues in the blocking pipeline: foreground detection only checking MOVE_TO_FOREGROUND, silent exception swallowing, missing SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW permission, no overlay permission in onboarding, deprecated onBackPressed, and Room DB crashes in receivers

title: Add persistent foreground tracking + fix audit docs
description: MonitoringService needs lastKnownForegroundPackage state so detection persists across polls. Also create fixes/05-10 and fixes/00-audit-summary.md documentation.
close_reason: Implemented persistent foreground tracking in MonitoringService + created fix docs 05-10 and audit summary

title: Profile sheet: full-screen bottom sheet with support and settings sections
description: Replace profile navigation with a full-screen ModalBottomSheet. Sections: Support (Get Help, Give Feedback), Screen Time Settings.
close_reason: Profile sheet implemented as full-screen ModalBottomSheet with Support (Get Help, Give Feedback) and Settings (Screen Time Settings) sections
